name: enchanter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who uses magic on someone or something: He is like a serpent enchanter. Suddenly, as if by the touch of a enchanter's wand, he became just like his father. See
enchant
More examplesFewer examplesSome might have taken him for a apprentice enchanter who had run away from his master. They stole a boat in the belief that it had been sent for them by an enchanter. The enchanter is the big red-haired fellow who is both their admired leader and dreaded taskmaster.
